name: essar_invoices_and_business_management_system
description: Invoice and Business management system for ESSAR Travel Hub
author: Shahid

scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dist:mac: npm run clean:dist && npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:win: npm run clean:dist && npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run clean:dist && npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: npm run transpile:electron && playwright test e2e/app.spec.ts
scripts.test:e2e:critical: npm run transpile:electron && playwright test e2e/app.spec.ts e2e/invoices.spec.ts
scripts.test:e2e:full: npm run transpile:electron && playwright test e2e/
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
